actions.name: Prankster
actions.description: Effect: The user's Status-Category Attacks have their [Priority X], [Interrupt X] and [Delay X] values increased by +1. The user's Status-Category Attacks that do not have a [Priority X], [Interrupt X] or [Delay X] trait gain [Priority 1].

system.description: Effect: The user's Status-Category Attacks have their [Priority X], [Interrupt X] and [Delay X] values increased by +1. The user's Status-Category Attacks that do not have a [Priority X], [Interrupt X] or [Delay X] trait gain [Priority 1].
